name: Rubbish Rumble
description:
A turn-based card game in which the player needs to defeat waves of enemies by sacrificing cards to play others.

"When the ocean fills with plastic and humans care no more; when trash awakens and threaten hundreds; it is time to fight, time to clean the waters, time to take action. We are the surfers from Rocinha, and this is only the beginning."

The player starts out with two characters on the field and receives character and equipment cards onto their hand after each turn which they need to use strategically in order to clear the enemy field to be able to reach the next wave and, in the end, survive and defeat the final boss.
